scripts.www:mobile.test: npm run build -- mobile test && npm run clear:www && npm run copy:mobile.test
scripts.www:mobile.uat: npm run build -- mobile uat && npm run clear:www && npm run copy:mobile.uat
scripts.www:mobile.prod: npm run build -- mobile prod && npm run clear:www && npm run copy:mobile.prod
scripts.pack:android.test: npm run www:mobile.test && cordova build android && mkdir -p dist/apk/test/debug && cp -a platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/debug/* dist/apk/test/debug
scripts.pack:android.uat: npm run www:mobile.uat && cordova build android && mkdir -p dist/apk/uat/debug && cp -a platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/debug/* dist/apk/uat/debug
scripts.pack:android.prod: npm run www:mobile.prod && cordova build android && mkdir -p dist/apk/prod/debug && cp -a platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/debug/* dist/apk/prod/debug
scripts.release:android.test: npm run www:mobile.test && cordova build android --release && mkdir -p dist/apk/test/release && cp -a platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/* dist/apk/test/release
scripts.release:android.uat: npm run www:mobile.uat && cordova build android --release && mkdir -p dist/apk/uat/release && cp -a platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/* dist/apk/uat/release
scripts.release:android.prod: npm run www:mobile.prod && cordova build android --release && mkdir -p dist/apk/prod/release && cp -a platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/* dist/apk/prod/release
